column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The overwrought dragon can no longer find it in himself to relax.
Scout the area around Reah Tahra.
Report to the overwrought dragon.
Hark! The grinding and shuddering of steel bodies... The metal, it cometh!
...Thou hearest naught? Mayhaps thy species hath not the sensitivity... Yet the machines come nevertheless.
Seek a vantage from which even thou mayest witness their dread approach...then hearken unto my words, and flee.
Flee, stranger, shouldst thou value thy life.
No one but dragons here. Forsooth!
Thou art returned... What didst thou ken?
Naught but dragons? Verily?
...Perhaps thou speakest in sooth. That mechanical cacophony plagueth me without cease... Though I swear 'tis clearer now than it hath ever been.
Should this be naught but mine own fears, returned fiercer with each coming... I know not how to quit myself of them.
What will you say?
Find strength in your comrades, and together overcome your fears.
You must embrace your fear to truly understand it.
You should fear nothing, as I do.
Thou art strong. Had my kin sought what thou hast found, perhaps our star would have met a different fate...
Thou art strong. Would that my kin had sought what thou hast found...
...Though there may yet be time. Naught can alter history's course, but the future awaiteth still. I thank thee for thine insight, courageous one.
